Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Abnormality of the fingernails 90% Alopecia 90% Aplasia/Hypoplasia of the eyebrow 90% Hypoplastic toenails 90% Microdontia 90% Palmoplantar keratoderma 90% Reduced number of teeth 90% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
